title: ChiBitCTy
author: ChiBitCTy
content: The 2023 Major League Baseball season quickly approaches us as all teams have their season openers this coming Thursday, March 30th. I know there aren't a whole lot of people on this forum who follow major league baseball, but I was hoping after an exciting World Baseball Classic, that a few more people might take a betting interest this year.Here's the odds for World Series Winners to start the year World Series Odds 2023TEAM   OPENING ODDS   CURRENT ODDSAstros   +700   +600Braves   +800   +750Yankees   +900   +750Dodgers   +500   +800Mets   +1100   +900Padres   +1400   +950Blue Jays   +900   +1400Phillies   +1300   +1600Mariners   +1800   +1800Cardinals   +1700   +2000Rays   +2200   +2200Guardians   +3500   +2500White Sox   +1400   +3000Angels   +2500   +4000Brewers   +2200   +4000Twins   +4000   +4000Giants   +3500   +5000Rangers   +5000   +5000Red Sox   +3000   +6000Orioles   +3500   +6600Cubs   +8000   +8000Marlins   +5000   +8000Diamondbacks   +6600   +12500Tigers   +5000   +12500Royals   +8000   +20000Pirates   +15000   +20000Reds   +10000   +25000Rockies   +8000   +30000Athletics   +15000   +50000Nationals   +15000   +50000(Date provided by-  https://sports.betmgm.com/en/blog/mlb/world-series-news-updates-odds-bm15/ )
